languages.text: "Тебя словно окутывает невесомое серебристое облако, сестра. В его объятиях... и я чувствую умиротворение".
"You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."
languages.original_text: "Тебя словно окутывает невесомое серебристое облако, сестра. В его объятиях... и я чувствую умиротворение".

traits.locale_text: "You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."
"You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."
"You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."
"You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."

languages.text: “一朵轻盈的银云包裹着你，修女。在它的怀抱中……我也感到很平静。”
languages.original_text: "You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."

traits.locale_text: “一朵轻盈的银云包裹着你，修女。在它的怀抱中……我也感到很平静。”

languages.text: « Le nuage qui vous enveloppe est d'une douce couleur argentée, ma sœur. Dans son étreinte... moi aussi, je me sens en paix. »
languages.original_text: "You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."

traits.locale_text: « Le nuage qui vous enveloppe est d'une douce couleur argentée, ma sœur. Dans son étreinte... moi aussi, je me sens en paix. »

languages.text: «Le envuelve una nube plateada y ligera. En su abrazo... yo también estoy en paz».
languages.original_text: "You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."

traits.locale_text: «Le envuelve una nube plateada y ligera. En su abrazo... yo también estoy en paz».

languages.text: 「シスター、あなたは重さのない銀色の雲に包まれています。その抱擁に…私も安らぎを感じます」
languages.original_text: "You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター、あなたは重さのない銀色の雲に包まれています。その抱擁に…私も安らぎを感じます」

languages.text: "Ihr seid von einer schwerelosen silbernen Wolke umhüllt, Schwester. In ihrer Umarmung ... fühle auch ich mich friedlich."
languages.original_text: "You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid von einer schwerelosen silbernen Wolke umhüllt, Schwester. In ihrer Umarmung ... fühle auch ich mich friedlich."

languages.original_text: "You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."

languages.text: "Yüksüz bir gümüş bulut etrafını sarmış Rahibe. Onun içinde... Ben de güvende hissediyorum."
languages.original_text: "You are enveloped by a weightless silver cloud, Sister. In its embrace... I too feel at peace."

traits.locale_text: "Yüksüz bir gümüş bulutla kaplısın Rahibe. Onun kolları arasında ben de güvende hissediyorum."
